Package net.minestom.server.timer

Class TaskBuilder

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.timer.TaskBuilder
public class TaskBuilder extends Object
A builder which represents a fluent Object to schedule tasks.

You can specify a delay with delay(long, TemporalUnit) or repeat(long, TemporalUnit) and then schedule the Task with schedule().

      Creates a task builder.
      Note: The task builder creates a normal task.
      Parameters:
      schedulerManager - The manager for the tasks
      runnable - The task to run when scheduled

    • TaskBuilder

      Creates a task builder.
      Parameters:
      schedulerManager - The manager for the tasks
      runnable - The task to run when scheduled
      shutdown - Defines whether the task is a shutdown task

    • makeTransient

      public TaskBuilder makeTransient()
      If this task is owned by an extension, should it survive the unloading of said extension? May be useful for delay tasks, but it can prevent the extension classes from being unloaded, and preventing a full reload of that extension.
